TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ConfigurationElement extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示配置文件中的配置元素。

span.span: Represents a configuration element within a configuration file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一个抽象类，用于表示一个 XML 元素 （如 Web.config) 的配置文件中。The is an abstract class that is used to represent an XML element in a configuration file (such as Web.config). 配置文件中的元素可以包含零个、 一个或多个子元素。An element in a configuration file can contain zero, one, or more child elements. 因为该类可以定义为抽象，无法创建它的实例。Because the class is defined as abstract, you cannot create an instance of it. 您仅可以从其派生类。You can only derive classes from it. .NET Framework 包括派生自的类类以表示标准的 XML 配置元素，如。The .NET Framework includes classes that derive from the class in order to represent standard XML configuration elements, such as . 你还可以扩展类访问自定义配置元素和部分。You can also extend the class to access custom configuration elements and sections. 包含在本主题后面部分的示例演示如何通过使用自定义派生自的类访问自定义配置元素和部分。The example included later in this topic shows how to access custom configuration elements and sections by using custom classes that derive from . 你还可以如扩展的标准配置类型， ， ，和。You can also extend the standard configuration types such as , , , and . 有关详细信息，请参阅这些类的文档。For more information, see the documentation for those classes. 有关如何访问配置文件中的信息的详细信息，请参阅类和类。For more information about how to access information in configuration files, see the class and the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现一个自定义同时作为自定义部分中的某个元素和自定义部分中的元素的集合。The following code example shows how to implement a custom both as an individual element in a custom section and as a collection of elements in a custom section. 该示例包含以下文件：The example consists of the following files: - 一个包含名为自定义部分的 app.config 文件`MyUrls`。An app.config file that contains a custom section that is named `MyUrls`. 本部分包含简单元素 （不包含任何其他元素），以及元素的集合。This section contains a simple element (it does not contain any other elements) and a collection of elements. 简单元素名为`simple`和集合命名为`urls`。The simple element is named `simple` and the collection is named `urls`. - 控制台应用程序。A console application. 应用程序读取 app.config 文件的内容，并将信息写入控制台。The application reads the contents of the app.config file and writes the information to the console. 它使用派生自的类， ，和。It uses classes that derive from , , and . - 一个名为类`UrlsSection`派生自类。A class named `UrlsSection` that derives from the class. 使用此类访问`MyUrls`配置文件中的部分。This class is used to access the `MyUrls` section in the configuration file. - 一个名为类`UrlsCollection`派生自类。A class named `UrlsCollection` that derives from the class. 使用此类访问`urls`配置文件中的集合。This class is used to access the `urls` collection in the configuration file. - 一个名为类`UrlConfigElement`派生自类。A class named `UrlConfigElement` that derives from the class. 使用此类访问`simple`元素和的成员`urls`配置文件中的集合。This class is used to access the `simple` element and the members of the `urls` collection in the configuration file. 若要运行该示例，请执行以下步骤：To run the example, perform the following steps: 1. 创建解决方案具有一个控制台应用程序项目和一个类库项目名为`ConfigurationElement`。Create a solution that has a console application project and a class library project that is named `ConfigurationElement`. 2. 将三个类文件放在类库项目中并将其他文件放在控制台类库项目中。Put the three class files in the class library project and put the other files in the console library project. 3. 在这两个项目设置的引用`System.Configuration`。In both projects set a reference to `System.Configuration`. 4. 在控制台应用程序项目设置对该类库项目的项目引用。In the console application project set a project reference to the class library project. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#151](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/CS/ConfigurationElement.cs#151)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#151](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/VB/ConfigurationElement.vb#151)] [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#71](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/CS/CustomSection.cs#71)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#71](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/VB/CustomSection.vb#71)] [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#51](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/CS/CustomElementCollection.cs#51)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#51](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/VB/CustomElementCollection.vb#51)] [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#31](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/CS/CustomElement.cs#31)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#31](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/VB/CustomElement.vb#31)]

block.para:
每个对象创建内部集合表示将元素属性或子元素的集合的对象。
Every object creates an internal collection of objects that represents either the element attributes or a collection of child elements.
非自定义的信息和功能所包含提供对象属性。
Non-customizable information and functionality is contained by an object provided by the property.
可用于以编程方式或声明性 （特性化） 编码模型创建自定义配置元素：
You can use either a programmatic or a declarative (attributed) coding model to create a custom configuration element:
- 编程模型要求每个元素属性，创建一个属性以获取或设置其值并将其添加到基础的内部属性包基类。The programmatic model requires that for each element attribute, you create a property to get or set its value and add it to the internal property bag of the underlying base class.有关如何使用此模型的示例，请参阅类。For an example of how to use this model, see the class.
- 更简单的声明性模型，也称为特性化的模型中，允许您通过使用的属性定义元素属性并然后与特性来修饰它。The simpler declarative model, also called the attributed model, allows you to define an element attribute by using a property and then decorate it with attributes.这些属性指示 ASP.NET 配置系统有关属性类型和其默认值。These attributes instruct the ASP.NET configuration system about the property types and their default values.使用此信息，通过反射，获取 ASP.NET 配置系统为你创建元素属性对象，并执行所需的初始化。With this information, obtained through reflection, the ASP.NET configuration system creates the element property objects for you and performs the required initialization.本主题稍后所示的示例演示如何使用此模型。The example shown later in this topic shows how to use this model.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A对象提供所需的上下文对象做出决策基于计算位置。A object provides the context necessary for a object to make decisions based upon where it is being evaluated. 对象提供的配置元素相关的环境详细信息。The object provides environment details related to an element of the configuration. 例如，你可以使用属性来确定是否已在 Machine.config 中设置，或者您可以决定哪些层次结构元素通过使用属于属性。For example, you can use the property to determine whether a was set in Machine.config, or you can determine which hierarchy a element belongs to by using the property.

exception.span: 当前元素未关联上下文。

span.span: The current element is not associated with a context.

summary.span: 指示自上次保存或加载该配置元素后并在派生类中实现该元素时，该元素是否已被修改。

span.span: Indicates whether this configuration element has been modified since it was last saved or loaded, when implemented in a derived class.

returns.span: 如果该元素已被修改，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the element has been modified; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法确定是否这对象将写入到配置文件时调用方法。The method determines whether this object will be written to the configuration file when the method is called. 如果返回的值为 `false`，则表明配置文件表示该元素的当前状态。If the return value is `false`, it is assumed that the configuration file represents the current state of the element. 默认情况下，返回`true`属性通过索引器设置为这后对象。By default, returns `true` after a property is set through the indexer to this object. 重写方法以提供自定义此状态指示元素。Override the method to provide custom indication of the state of this element. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何扩展。The following example shows how to extend . [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#35](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/CS/CustomElement.cs#35)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#35](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/VB/CustomElement.vb#35)] 在前面的示例所示的方法调用时修改配置元素，如以下示例所示。The method shown in the previous example is called when a configuration element is modified, as in the following example. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/CS/ConfigurationElement.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/VB/ConfigurationElement.vb#6)]

summary.span: 获取被锁定的特性的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of locked attributes.

value.span: 该元素被锁定的特性（属性）的 。

span.span: The of locked attributes (properties) for the element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性，可在一次锁定的所有属性，除了一个你指定。The property allows you to lock all the attributes at once, with the exception of the one you specify. 若要做到这一点，你可以使用方法，如示例部分中所述。To do that, you use the method, as explained in the Example section. > [!NOTE] > 属性，可防止子向其应用规则免遭修改的元素的配置元素。The property allows you to prevent the child configuration elements of the element to which you apply the rule from being modified. 使用自身及其子元素，如果你想要设置常规属性锁定父元素上。Use the property if you want to put a general lock on the parent element itself and its child elements. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用。The following example shows how to use the . [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/CS/ConfigurationElement.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/VB/ConfigurationElement.vb#9)]

para.span: 如果你使用和同时属性，应用限制性最强的规则。

span.span: If you use the and properties at the same time, the most restrictive rule applies.
